rows.label: qst200222_msg0001
rows.name:
Harghal, what are you doing in a place
like this? You can tell me everything.

rows.label: qst200222_msg0002
rows.name:
I know you are not the kind of girl
who would resort to crime lightly.

rows.label: qst200222_msg0003
rows.name:
Those eyes of yours...
They're just like my old dad's.

rows.label: qst200222_msg0004
rows.name: All right, all right. I'll talk.

rows.label: qst200222_msg0005
rows.name:
I was using the Pollen Orbs to make
an even more potent substance.
A beverage I call...Bolla Bolla!

rows.label: qst200222_msg0007
rows.name:
Eating Pollen Orbs is mostly a Nopon
thing, right? But if I intensify the effect,
humans will get hooked on it too.

rows.label: qst200222_msg0008
rows.name:
That's a most terrifying idea
you have there...

rows.label: qst200222_msg0010
rows.name:
What's wrong, Harghal?
Go on, you can tell us the rest.

rows.label: qst200222_msg0011
rows.name:
No...I've already said too much.
Please, just go away.

rows.label: qst200222_msg0012
rows.name:
Sorry, but I don't have anything
more to say to you people.
